full_text:
From: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (USANYS)
Sent: Thursday, July 11, 2019 9:43 PM
To: (b)(6) @bop.gov (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov
Cc: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (USANYS) (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @usa.doj.gov; (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (USANYS) (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @usa.doj.gov>
Subject: Subpoena and Request for Emails
Importance: High

(b)(6), (b)(7)(C)

Attached please find a subpoena for recordings of Jeffrey Epstein's phone calls, excluding any attorney calls.

In addition to the materials requested in the enclosed subpoena, please accept our written request for the e-mail correspondence of inmate Jeffrey Epstein (76318-054) from July 6, 2019 through July 11, 2019 - excluding any correspondence between Epstein (b)(6), (b)(7)(C)

As you can see on the subpoena, we have set the return date for tomorrow (July 12, 2019). We would be very grateful if we could receive the requested materials as soon as possible. As always, please feel free to call (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) or me with any questions or concerns.

Thanks very much,
(b)(6) (b)(7)(C)

Assistant United States Attorney
Southern District of New York
1 St. Andrew's Plaza
New York, NY 10007
212-637(b)(6)
(b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov

Page 5625
DOJ-OGR-00024283

additional_notes: The document contains redactions marked as (b)(6) and (b)(7)(C), indicating sensitive information has been withheld.
